name: We bring gifts (drinks)
description: Automatically serve clients when they want drinks.
detailedDescription:
Not exactly the most glamour of work, but we have some "employees" who are specialized in delivering things. Even legal stuff, sometimes. 
We could ask them to help with your clients, so that they would give them something to drink when they want some. 

Don't worry we'll give them the good stuff, no moonshine that makes you blind. Except if they want it, of course.
